# Separator

###### Note: Please bear with the current documentation. Docs will be updated soon.

Just a line used to separate two items.

### Props
Key | Type | Default
----|----|----
size | number | 1 
color | string | #eee 

### Usage
```
import { Separator } from 'react-native-btr';

<Separator 
  size={2}
  color='#484'
/>

<Separator />
```
